accountCreated_1: Thank you for creating a SavUp account.
accountCreated_2: To complete the process, please look for an email from
accountCreated_3: in your inbox, spam, or junk folders.
accountCreated_4: Click on the link in the email and then you will be able to log into your account.
accountCreated_5: Don't put all your eggs in one basket. The 1% invest in the stock market, bonds, private equity, hedge funds and commercial loans.
addressMessage: Your address must be added and verified before you can use the service.
amountEmpty: You have to enter an amount to start growing your money and building your financial future.
amountTip:
This is the amount SavUp is going to allocate.
You can adjust it.
birthdateMessages: NOTE: You must be at least 18 years of old in order to use service.
cannotCreateAccount: Can not create a new account.
checkEmail: SavUp email will arrive usually within 5 minutes but could take up to 1 day. Please check your inbox, spam, or junk folders for an email from support@sty-holdings.com.
confirmText: Great job investing your money and building your financial future. We will post this update to your account later today and your will see it first thing in the morning.
createAccountTitle_1: Lets get to know each other 🙂
defaultContactMethod: We will reach out using email, unless you pick another method.
firstNameRequired: You must enter your first name.
lastNameRequired: You must enter your last name.
lockedBundle: You have already adjusted the amount and the bundle is now locked.
passwordChanged: Account password has been changed successfully!
passwordNoChanged: Your password cannot be reset at this time.
passwordRecommendations:
Password Recommendations:
 - At least 8 characters long
 - contains at least 1 number
 - contains at least 1 uppercase and 1 lower case letter
 - contains at least 1 special character
passwordSent:
Please check your email for the code to reset your password. The email will be from support@sty-holdings.com and it will be in your inbox, spam, or junk folders. 
 
Please enter the verification code and new password below.
phoneNumberRequired: Both area code and phone number are needed.
serviceRestrictions_1: You must be at least 18 years old.
serviceRestrictions_2: Service is limited to the following states at this time: CA, DE, IL, IN, MD, NE, NJ, NV, NY, OH, TN, TX, VA,WA
stateRestriction: Note: Available to CA, DE, IL, IN, NE, NV, TN, WA state residences. More states coming soon!
swipeTip: You can swipe left and right to see Bundles.
taxFooter: This is required to be entered before you can make an interest withdrawal.
taxHeader:
You will get a 1099-INT at 
the end of the year for taxes. 
Yes, Uncle Sam wants a piece.
taxIdBlocked:
Tax Information is blocked for security reasons.
Contact support@sty-holdings.com
to reset.
taxRequired: In order for you to make a deposit and start getting great returns, you have to enter an SSN or EIN.
transferInSuccess: Your transfer is in progress. Please check your email for additional details.
usernameValidator: User name must contain at least 8 characters.
